title: Code Registry
description: JSON Schema for the code registry (planning sessions and task codes)

version.description: Semantic version of the registry format

generatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the registry was generated

lastPlanningNumber.description: Last used planning number (e.g., 4 for P-004)

code.description: Short planning code (e.g., P-001, PF-004, PR-002, PB-042)

fullCode.description: Full planning code with description (e.g., P-004-workflow-optimization)

sessionPath.description: Relative path to the planning session directory

status.description: Current status of the planning session

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 date when the session was created (YYYY-MM-DD)

completedAt.description: ISO 8601 date when the session was completed (YYYY-MM-DD)

archivedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the session was archived

tasks.description: Array of task codes for this planning session
